评论详情: barely fits even though i did the exact measurements, way too small

Got these as a gift to my bf, I got the XL size because it would give about an inch of extra space and i thought that would be enough, after measuring it when it arrived it was either the wrong size or not measured correctly, it’s a comfy but 0 stretch material so unfortunately I have to go out of my way to tailor them to the correct size

They were very nice, just be careful making sure your measurements are correct, I had to return them because I got the wrong size, but they were very nice I would have kept them if they fit me, also the package came 1 week sooner then Expected, so I was very happy about that to, 5 Stars From me...
Fits well my grandson is happy with the style and comfort of the fit  Good

I really like them, aside from one issue. The legs are a great length (I’m 5’7) but the crotch and waist are too long. Very high waisted (above bellybutton) and the crotch extends three inches too long. If you’re prepared for a little bit of sewing I highly recommend these! Otherwise, probably find something else. :)
The pants are nice and it sits on your hips. My only thing about it is that the material is kind of thin

I was in need of pants and I wanted a cheaper alternative for my style. when I ordered I sized up a little bit so it would be a little loose but comfortable but instead I got a very tight fit in my hips and waist. the over all design of the pants where also bad it doesn't compare to the image. the pants looked very 2D and not fleshed out properly. and I bet you think the straps look cool well those are holding on with hopes and prayers. they use buttons to hold it on but they fell off while putting them on and serval times after( I was standing still). I do not recommend thesis pants unless you hate yourself and enjoy wasting money.
I gave them to my son, as they were a bit too snug for me.

I’m a male, cool pants, tight fit, comfortable
I’m 5’7 and wear a 34/32 and the sz large was still a little tight on my thighs. That’s a me problem though but besides that, the pants looks sick and I’m wearing them for a rave. 10/10 for me!
